div.p: Map of Arunachal Pradesh, northeastern India, with locations of the sampling sites. The triangles correspond to sampling sites in West Siang, circles to those in Upper Subansiri and rectangles to Tawang sampling sites. Inset: Location of the study site at the edge of Tibetan Plateau.
Click here for additional data file.

p.span: Arunachal and bonnet macaque samples used in the study and their sites of origin.

div.p: Click here for additional data file.
